commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match return types in function declarations
commits.body: Before these were passed back to the basic grammar, now match the valid items specifically.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Allow default values in type-hinted function parameters
commits.body:
Merges the various previous rules into a single rule allowing the same items in all cases. Some scoping has been updated to be in line with conventions.

Fixes #75 and #81.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Allow matching class-names at end of a string
commits.body: This allows using the match inside of a capture.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This was tripping up the language grammar grammar causing the rest of the file to be mis-highlighted.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Update grammar, completions, etc. to PHP 7.1.7
commits.body: This also fixes some escaping issues with the last generation pass mentioned in #78.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Escape strings before passing through regex generator
commits.body: This is needed due to `\` being used in some PHP identifiers.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Ensure word boundaries in indentation rules

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Inject into the new source.js scopes

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Update grammar, completions, etc. to PHP 7.1
